```{r}
library(matlib)
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tlc=fread("tlc.dat")
```

```{r}
y1=tlc%>%filter(group=="A")%>%select(-c(id,group))
y0=tlc%>%filter(group=="P")%>%select(-c(id,group))
y1bar=colMeans(y1)
y0bar=colMeans(y0)
s0=cov(y0)
s1=cov(y1)
sd1=sqrt(diag(s1))
sd0=sqrt(diag(s0))
```

# Problem 11.2

```{r}
sei=fread("seizure.dat")
```


```{r}
mod1=glm(y ~ treatment, family="poisson", data=sei)
summary(mod1)
```

```{r}
mod2=glm(y~treatment+age,family="poisson", data=sei)
summary(mod2)
```
